channel.title: Server Problems (disconnecting)
channel.description:
Hi well i got my own server i run the server i load up www.moparisthebest.com then i log in to the owner account and it logs in then if i do something like open a shop do ::bank or open a bank the screen freezes and i look on the the server and it says this
[code]- SilencedScape v1 - .. Online! Connection accepted from localhost: 4142. Client type: low memory version UserId: 30510331 Silenced is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-Silenced]: Loading finished. Game saved for player Silenced [b]ClientHandler: Client Silenced disconnected.[/b] [/code]
I need help! can anyone tell me why i keep disconnecting? [b]NOTE**** [/b] this happens on any account i log into (even not owner, admin or mod)
thanks

item.title: Server Problems (disconnecting)
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

It has nothing to do with the client unless your using a high id number say about 10000 its probally a error in the code you did,just undo what you last did before you couldnâ€™t log in.

item.title: Server Problems (disconnecting)
item.dc:creator: @Silenced Silenced
item.description:
@Silenced wrote:

Hi
well i got my own server
i run the server
i load up www.moparisthebest.com
then i log in to the owner account
and it logs in
then if i do something like
open a shop
do ::bank
or open a bank
the screen freezes and i look on the the server and it says this

- SilencedScape v1 - .. Online! Connection accepted from localhost: 4142. Client type: low memory version UserId: 30510331 Silenced is signing onto server. LOADED: 3 [client-1-Silenced]: Loading finished. Game saved for player Silenced [b]ClientHandler: Client Silenced disconnected.[/b]

I need help!
can anyone tell me why i keep disconnecting?
NOTE**** this happens on any account i log into (even not owner, admin or mod)

thanks
